title: Height of building shall be allowed to the extent mentioned below subject to approval of Chief Fire Officer of the Authority or Director of Fire services, if required, under these regulations
clause_text: Height of building shall be allowed to the extent mentioned below subject to approval of Chief Fire Officer of the Authority or Director of Fire services, if required, under these regulations.
section: Buildings Abutting Two or More Streets
